![](../../img/news/number7.png){fig-align="center" width=400px}

The seventh session of the ABC (Accessible Bioinformatics Cafe) will be **on october 24th, at 13:00 - building 1240-218**

Everyone is welcome to **join independently of coding skills and level**. 

## Agenda
 
We have a very minimalistic agenda consisting of

- What's new
- Accessible topic presentation
- Tutorials and Open Coding

The tutorials we propose are of increasing difficulty (and [documented](../../Documentation.qmd) at each meeting. This time we have

- To be arranged

You can also bring your own code and issues and get help from us.
 
## Signing up

No signup is really necessary, but if you just want to ensure there is enough cake (and you are pretty sure you will show up), click on the button below to give us a heads up of your presence. Don't do it multiple times to cheat for extra cake!
